context: Hi there What are you looking to see?
I would love to watch an action movie. Do you have any suggestions?
resp: Casino Royale (2006) has a lot of action. I also love Red Sparrow (2018) Heat (1996) is a great classic action movie, but Goodfellas (1990) has a lot of heart
